description: Michael Lachlan always looks good no matter what: in athletic clothes, a suit, naked -- well, he's preferred to be naked. His face is handsome, his body is incredible, and the big fat uncut cock he has between his legs is a killer. And it's this battering ram that Seth Treston and Addison Graham want to play with, and play with it they do! They guys go back and forth over who will get to take a ride on it first, and who can blame them?
title: Michael Lachlan Shows Seth Treston and Addison Graham Who's Boss
